name: Improving Facebook
description:
This hides the Games your friends are playing panel on FB.  You can add the code to your themes or activate this.  It will leave a small empty cell, if you toggle it on and off, you will see where it was.  I do not believe it affects anything else.  Minimally tested.  Added "Happening Now" hidden.
